{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "countries": {
            "type": "object",
            "additionalProperties": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                    "languages": {
                        "type": "array",
                        "items": {
                            "type": "string"
                        }
                    },
                    "capital": {
                        "type": "string"
                    },
                    "population": {
                        "type": "integer"
                    },
                    "citizens": {
                        "type": "array",
                        "items": {
                            "type": "object",
                            "properties": {
                                "name": {
                                    "type": "string"
                                },
                                "birthyear": {
                                    "type": "integer"
                                },
                                "hometown": {
                                    "type": "string"
                                }
                            },
                            "required": [
                                "name",
                                "birthyear",
                                "hometown"
                            ],
                            "additionalProperties": false
                        }
                    }
                },
                "required": [
                    "languages",
                    "capital",
                    "population",
                    "citizens"
                ],
                "additionalProperties": false
            }
        }
    },
    "required": [
        "countries"
    ],
    "additionalProperties": false,
    "$schema": "https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema"
}
